name: Operator Pattern Implementation Journey
title: Pattern Discovery â†’ Team Implementation â†’ Results Tracking
description: Documents how operational teams (support managers, ops leads) discover patterns, implement orchestration improvements, and measure impact on team velocity and quality
purpose: Enable hands-on operators to translate patterns into concrete workflow improvements
trigger: Operator receives approved pattern from leadership or discovers pattern while researching operational improvements

policies: Implementation checklist must be actionable (no abstract guidance)
Metrics must be measurable with existing tools
Diagrams must be copyable for team documentation
Checklists must be exportable to project management tools
metrics: Time from pattern discovery to implementation start
